string.value: The word 'Bow' was written on the #p2103001#. You think it signifies person. Hmm, didn't you see someone carrying a bow in #m260000000#? You think his name may have been #p2101011#.

#p2101011# is indeed a member of the Sand Bandits. He seems reluctant to trust you and says you need to gather some food to prove you're not a spy. By food, he means #b#t4000325#s#k, #b#t2010000#s, and #t2010002#s#k.

#i2010000# #t2010000# #b#c2010000# / 10#k
#i2010002# #t2010002# #b#c2010002# / 10#k
#i4000325# #t4000325# #b#c4000325# / 50#k
When you gave #p2101011# the food, he told you that you'll have to do more for #m260000000# to earn his trust. Fine. Talk to #p2101011# again and see what else you can do.
...무슨 일이지? 대수롭지 않은 이유로 말을 건 거라면 가만두지 않겠어... 뭐? 모래그림단원이 되고 싶다고? 흠... 벽에 있는 글을 보고 찾아온 모양이지? 그렇다면 #p2101000#이 보냈다는 건데... 하지만, 그 애의 눈을 전부 믿을 수는 없지.
당신은 #m260000000# 사람이 아니야. 외부인이 #m260000000# 주민들의 고통에 대해 이해할 수 있을 리가 없는데 뭘 믿고 당신을 단원으로 받아들라는 거지? 당신이 왕비의 첩자가 아니라는 증거가 있나? 당신이 모래그림단을 위해 일을 해줄 수 있겠어?
좋아. 그렇게 말했으니 시험을 해보도록 하지. 모래그림단이 #m260000000# 주민들을 위해 물자를 모은다는 건 알고 있겠지? #m260000000# 사람들이 먹을 수 있도록 음식을 구해 오도록 해. 구해와야 할 건 #b#t4000325# 50개#k와 #b#t2010002# 10개#k, #b#t2010000# 10개#k야.
설마 이 정도 가지고 힘들다고 하지는 않겠지? 모래그림단원의 진짜 임무는 이것보다 훨씬 어려워. #r#o2100101##k를 잡아 #b#t4000325##k를 가져오는 것 정도는, 아무것도 아니라고. 그럼 당신의 능력을 기대해 보지.
그것 봐. 역시 못 하잖아? 당신은 왕비의 첩자인게 분명해.
What?! If you just want to chat, buzz off. What? You want to join the Sand Bandits? Hmmm, you must have seen the writing on the wall. Haha! That means #p2101000# sent you…

You are not from #m260000000#. You can't even begin to understand the pain the people in #m260000000# are suffering, so what qualifies you to become a member of our group? How do we know you're not a spy from the queen? You willing to do some work for us?

Alright, then I'll test you. You know the Sand Bandits collect goods for the residents of #m260000000#, right? I want you to get some food for the people here. Get #b50 #t4000325#s#k, #b10 #t2010002#s#k, and #b10 #t2010000#s#k.
Don't tell me this is hard, okay? Our real missions are much, much tougher than this. Gathering #b#t4000325#s#k by killing #r#o2100101#s#k is nothing.
Look at that, you refuse! You must be a spy sent by the queen!
Hmmm, did you bring all the items I requested? Let's see. One, two, three... Not bad. You got it all.
But this is nothing. Even spies from the queen can do this. If you really want to be accepted as a member of the Sand Bandits, you'll need to do more.
Hey, you didn't get it all! I told you, I need #b50 #t4000325#s#k, #b10 #t2010002#s#k, and #b10 #t2010000#s#k.
